title: Fully Remodeled 2bd/1ba w/ SS Appl + W/D (217 - 4)
posting_body: ['217 Lucas Ave. #4', 'Los Angeles, CA 90026', 'Available NOW!', "Welcome to 215-225 Lucas Ave, new high end apartment adjacent to L.A.'s iconic Echo Park neighborhood.", 'Featuring serene two and three bedroom apartments surrounded by beautiful new gardens and picturesque landscapes.', 'Inside the newly remodeled residences, revel in bright and airy living room/kitchen space with beautiful open floor plans and woods flooring throughout.', 'Be the first to enjoy all new stainless steel appliances in newly remodeled kitchens with jet black quartz and matte black finishes.', 'All units are fully equipped with a washer and dryer, all new appliances, and mini-split air conditioner.', 'Enjoy the best of city living by stepping outside your private oasis into one of our new layouts that offer a private patio or balcony.', '***Disclaimer - pictures may not be of the exact vacant unit but represents the style and fixtures of the exact unit.', '***', 'AMENITIES:', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Hardwood Flooring', '- Minisplit AC System', '- Washer and dryer in unit.', '- Mirror Closets', '- Recessed Lighting', '- Patio/Balcony in select units', 'UTILITIES INCLUDED:', '- hot water, cold water, and gas.', 'DETAILS:', '- 2 bedrooms / 1 bathroom', 'PARKING:', '- 1 parking spot.', 'PET POLICY:', '- will consider pets.', 'RENTAL TERMS:', '- Application Fee: $36 (Non- Refundable)', '- Lease: 1-year minimum.', '- Security Deposit: $1,500 on approved credit only.', 'Please call our office at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a showing!']
